Metadata.title: Next.js i18n Template - Bilingual Starter Template
Metadata.description: Next.js internationalization (i18n) starter kit with English and Vietnamese support. Includes shadcn UI, theme switching, and RTL support.
Metadata.keywords: Next.js, i18n, internationalization, English, Vietnamese, bilingual, template, starter template, shadcn UI, RTL support
